        public <T> T requestObject(String address,
                  Class<T> responseClass)
                throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: SoaService
        Send a REST request and serialize the response to an object. The serialization is controlled by the org.ambraproject.wombat.config.SpringConfiguration#gson() bean.
        Specified by:
        requestObject in interface SoaService
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of responseClass
        Parameters:
        address - the path to which to send the REST request
        responseClass - the object type into which to serialize the JSON response
        Returns:
        the response, serialized from JSON into an object
        Throws:
        IOException - if there is an error connecting to the server

      • requestCachedStream

        public <T> T requestCachedStream(String cacheKey,
                        String address,
                        CacheDeserializer<InputStream,T> callback)
                      throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: SoaService
        Get a stream either through a REST request or from the cache. If there is a cached value, and the REST service does not indicate that the value has been modified since the value was inserted into the cache, return that value. Else, query the service for a new stream and convert that stream to a cacheable return value using the provided callback.
        Specified by:
        requestCachedStream in interface SoaService
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of value to deserialize and return
        Parameters:
        cacheKey - the cache key at which to retrieve and store the value
        address - the address to query the SOA service if the value is not cached
        callback - how to deserialize a new value from the stream, to return and insert into the cache
        Returns:
        the value from the service or cache
        Throws:
        IOException

      • requestCachedReader

        public <T> T requestCachedReader(String cacheKey,

                        CacheDeserializer<Reader,T> callback)
                      throws IOException
        Specified by:
        requestCachedReader in interface SoaService
        Throws:

      • requestCachedObject

        public <T> T requestCachedObject(String cacheKey,
                        String address,
                        Class<T> responseClass)
                      throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: SoaService
        Serialize an object either through a REST request or from the cache. If there is a cached value, and the REST service does not indicate that the value has been modified since the value was inserted into the cache, return that value. Else, query the service for JSON and deserialize it to an object as usual.
        Specified by:
        requestCachedObject in interface SoaService
        Type Parameters:
        T - the type of responseClass
        Parameters:
        cacheKey - the cache key at which to retrieve and store the value
        address - the address to query the SOA service if the value is not cached
        responseClass - the type of object to deserialize
        Returns:
        the deserialized object
        Throws:
        IOException

      • requestAsset

        public org.apache.http.client.methods.CloseableHttpResponse requestAsset(String assetId,
                                                                org.apache.http.Header... headers)
                                                                  throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: SoaService
        Requests an asset, returning both the headers and stream.

        The caller must either close the returned CloseableHttpResponse object or close the InputStream to the response body. This is very important, because leaving responses hanging open can starve the connection pool and cause horrible timeouts.

        Specified by:
        requestAsset in interface SoaService
        Parameters:
        assetId - the asset ID within the SOA service's "assetfiles/" namespace
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IOException

                                                                          String key,
                                                                          String version)
                                                                            throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: SoaService
        Requests a file from the content repository. Returns the full response.
        Specified by:
        requestFromContentRepo in interface SoaService
        Parameters:
        bucket - content repo bucket
        key - content repo key
        version - content repo version
        Returns:
        the response from the content repo
        Throws:
